headline: Is Constellation Energy Stock a Buy Now?
summary: Is it time to buy Constellation Energy now that its share price has fallen 15% from its 52-week high?

headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Fall On Tariff And Rate Jitters
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Monday, Jan, 19 2026 US stock futures are pointing lower this morning, with E mini S&P 500 contracts down about 0.8% and Nasdaq 100 futures off around 1.2%, as investors react to a mix of global growth and interest rate signals. In China, 2025 GDP came in at 5.0%, while investment in long term projects fell 3.8%. This combination suggests growth is being held up by factories rather than construction or property, which matters for companies tied to...

headline: Does Constellation Energy’s (CEG) Massive Shelf and NRC Win Reframe Its Data Center Nuclear Thesis?
summary: In early January 2026, Constellation Energy filed a shelf registration for up to US$17.60 billion of common stock and secured Nuclear Regulatory Commission approval for a first-of-its-kind digital modernization of its Limerick nuclear plant’s control and protection systems. At the same time, new federal policy proposals pushing big tech firms to fund new power plants and capping returns on existing capacity have introduced fresh regulatory uncertainty for Constellation’s largely carbon-free...
